name: Animal Retribution - Alpha 1
description:
Animal Retribution

Play as 1 of 4 (2) animals and fight against an onslaught of tyrannous farmers.

Grab up to 3 friends for local co-op and take advantage of finding the perfect team synergy.

A project by The Brie Team:

  • Harry Tyler - Programming
  • Hardwin Marsden - Design
  • Flora Pusey - Art
  • Lewis Bailey - Art
  • Leo Lane - Art
  • Lauren Welshman - Art
  • Ossie Nejat - Art
  • Orlanda Seawright - Art
